changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.staff ( id int8 NOT NULL, login varchar NOT NULL, "password" varchar NOT NULL, email varchar NULL, phone_number varchar NOT NULL, is_deleted bool DEFAULT false NOT NULL, "role" public."user_role" NOT NULL, "position" public."staff_position" NOT NULL, fullname varchar NULL, CONSTRAINT user_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT user_unique UNIQUE (login), CONSTRAINT user_unique_1 UNIQUE (email), CONSTRAINT user_unique_2 UNIQUE (phone_number) );
